name: Newtown Park Cycle Club
description: A social, welcoming and non-competitive road and gravel cycling community. Open to everyone who enjoys riding their bike, and drinking tasty beer.

events.name: Hills & Pils
events.details: We ride up and down the lovely hills of Cotham, Redland and Clifton, before finishing with a drink or two at Left Handed Giant Brewpub on Finzels Reach.

location.address: Millenium Square, Explore Lane, Bristol BS1 5SZ
location.details: Meet by the big silver disco ball in Millennium Square.

events.name: Sunday Social rides
events.details: Longer social rides with groups that cycle at different paces. Routes change, for the latest details check the event announcement on Instagram.

time.details: See the event announcement on Instagram for the latest details. Meet from 09:30 for a 10:00 start.
